name: Aegis Combat System
desc: The Aegis Combat System is an American integrated naval weapons system developed by the Missile and Surface Radar Division of RCA, and now produced by Lockheed Martin. It uses powerful computer and radar technology to track and guide weapons to destroy enemy targets.
short: The Aegis Combat System is an American integrated naval weapons system which uses powerful computer and radar technology to track and guide weapons to destroy enemy targets.

name: Electromagnetic Catapult
desc: The Electromagnetic Catapult, also called EMALS ("electromagnetic aircraft launch system") after the specific US system, is a type of aircraft launching system. Compared to steam catapults, EMALS requires less maintenance and manpower, recharges quicker, and uses less energy, increases the fighter replacement rate by %s.
short: The Electromagnetic Catapult, also called EMALS ("electromagnetic aircraft launch system") is a type of aircraft launching system. It increases the fighter replacement rate by %s.
